sentences.english: The residents of Kiev didn’t even know they lived on a “powder keg”.
sentences.chinese: 基辅的居民并不知道他们正住在“炸药桶”上。

sentences.english: The level of activity in the Kyiv area is also increasing rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 基辅地区的活跃程度也在迅速上升。

sentences.english: Babi Yar is a ravine in Kiev, the capital of Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 娘子谷是乌克兰首都基辅的一条沟壑。

sentences.english: Mr. Powell met the new Ukrainian leader at his modest party headquarters in Kiev as hundreds of thousands of Mr.
sentences.chinese: 鲍威尔和尤先科在基辅尤先科不起眼的党部见面。

sentences.english: A city of southwest European U. S. S. R. south-southeast of Kiev.
sentences.chinese: 苏联欧洲部分西南部一城市，位于基辅东南偏南。

sentences.english: The museum was located in the suburbs of Kiev in 1976.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆建造于1976年，坐落在首都基辅的郊外。

sentences.english: And in the following winter this player was offloaded to Dynamo Kiev.
sentences.chinese: 而在接下来的冬天这名球员就被转给了基辅迪那摩。

sentences.english: A city of south-central European U. S. S. R. east of Kiev.
sentences.chinese: 苏联欧洲部分中南部城市，位于基辅以东。

sentences.english: One of the biggest unfinished buildings in Kiev.
sentences.chinese: 基辅规模最大的未完工的建筑之一。

sentences.english: How did state formation come about in Kievan and Muscovite Russia?
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯基辅公国与莫斯科公国有着什么样的国家组织？

sentences.english: Ukrainian champions Dynamo Kiev are eager to strike a loan deal for Andrei Shevchenko.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰联赛冠军基辅迪那摩希望租借安德烈舍甫琴柯。

sentences.english: The business class from beijing to kiev is nice. Was able to streach my leg and sleep well.
sentences.chinese: 从北京到基辅的飞机商务舱很好，我能舒服地睡一觉。

sentences.english: You can find it on the bank of the Dnieper, several kilometers far from the Kiev Hydroelectric Power Station.
sentences.chinese: 它位于聂伯河岸边，距基辅水利发电站数千米。

sentences.english: Babi Yar is a ravine just outside Kiev which is the capital of Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮尔伯格是一个深谷基辅郊外的是乌克兰首都。

sentences.english: Putin has already indicated that Kiev can’t pursue both goals.
sentences.chinese: 普京早就道明，基辅不能鱼与熊掌兼得。

sentences.english: A city of west-central European U. S. S. R. north-northeast of Kiev.
sentences.chinese: 苏联欧洲部分中西部城市，位于基辅东北偏北。

pinyin: Sai1 wa3 si1 tuo1 bo1 er3

definition: Volgograd, Russian city on the Volga River 伏爾加河|伏尔加河[Fu2 er3 jia1 He2]
